gmd:fileIdentifier.gco:CharacterString: gov.nasa.echo:SeaWiFS Deep Blue Aerosol Optical Depth and Angstrom Exponent Monthly Level 3 Data Gridded at 0.5 Degrees V003

gmd:deliveryPoint.gco:CharacterString: Code 610.2 Bldg 32 Rm S151, NASA Goddard Space Flight Center

gmd:metadataStandardName.gco:CharacterString: ISO 19115-2 Geographic Information - Metadata Part 2 Extensions for imagery and gridded data

gmd:title.gco:CharacterString: SWDB_L3M05 > SeaWiFS Deep Blue Aerosol Optical Depth and Angstrom Exponent Monthly Level 3 Data Gridded at 0.5 Degrees

gmd:description.gco:CharacterString: SeaWiFS Deep Blue Aerosol Optical Depth and Angstrom Exponent Monthly Level 3 Data Gridded at 0.5 Degrees
DIFEntryId

gmd:otherCitationDetails.gco:CharacterString: ORIGINATOR: N. Christina Hsu, Corey Bettenhausen, Andrew Sayer, and M.-J. Jeong PUBLICATION DATE: December 21, 2011 TITLE: SeaWiFS Deep Blue Aerosol Optical Depth and Angstrom Exponent Monthly Level 3 Data Gridded at 0.5 Degrees

gmd:abstract.gco:CharacterString:
The SeaWiFS Deep Blue Level 3 Monthly Product contains monthly global gridded (0.5 x 0.5 deg) data derived from SeaWiFS Deep Blue Level 3 daily gridded data.
The primary data parameters are aerosol optical thickness, Angstrom exponent, and single scattering albedo.
(The Shortname for this product is SWDB_L3M05).
Parameters contained in the data files include the following:
aerosol_optical_thickness_550_land | aerosol optical thickness estimated at 550 nm over land | (1) aerosol_optical_thickness_550_land_ocean | aerosol optical thickness estimated at 550 nm over land and ocean | (1) aerosol_optical_thickness_550_ocean | aerosol optical thickness estimated at 550 nm over ocean | (1) aerosol_optical_thickness_land | aerosol optical thickness at 412 nm, 490 nm, and 670 nm over land | (1) aerosol_optical_thickness_ocean | aerosol optical thickness at 412 nm, 490 nm, and 670 nm over ocean | (1) angstrom_exponent_land | angstrom exponent over land as derived from aerosol optical thickness at 412 nm and 490 nm | (1) angstrom_exponent_land_ocean | angstrom exponent over land and ocean as derived from aerosol optical thickness at 412 nm and 490 nm | (1) angstrom_exponent_ocean | angstrom exponent over ocean as derived from aerosol optical thickness at 412 nm and 490 nm | (1)
End of parameter information
